title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on satin ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of white satin with large-scale pattern in cut and uncut blue, red and yellow velvet. Only small part of the design remains: a large-scale floral pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk
